commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Was this the right time?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yeah. It should be the right place, too, but I don't see them.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Me neither. I wonder what happened.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Huff* *Pant* Sorry to keep you all waiting!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Oh, Chika, Riko!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I'm sorry we're late.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: It's okay. I'm glad you made it here safely!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Sorry. Chika just wouldn't wake up.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Laugh* That sounds like Chika-chi.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: N-Now, now! It all worked out!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Ahem... Anyway.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Welcome to Numazu! Let's have an awesome day today!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: First, we'll go to the bus stop! I want you all to experience a Numazu bus ride.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: So beautiful. It's all ocean as far as the eye can see. It's lovely.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: There's so much nature and incredible scenery. It really lifts my spirits!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Right? Right? Riko said she loves these views!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: It's a little embarrassing to hear you say that so bluntly.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Really? I can see why you love it. I'm moved by how beautiful it is.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: In that case, I'm really glad we showed it to you.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Every time I see this view, I think about how happy I am that I moved to Uchiura.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yes, I would love to live somewhere this beautiful.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: What?! D-Does that mean...?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: If we can get you to like Uchiura enough, maybe μ's and the Nijigasaki girls will move here one day!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: What's another, even better place than here? If I show you someplace good, you'll like Uchiura even more.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: And then, this town will become even more lively, and every day will be like a festival, and then, and then...

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Chika, I don't think that's going to happen.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Giggle* Maybe your wish will come true.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Today's a good day to make a wish.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Huh? What do you mean?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Well, well, why do you think that is?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: If we ask this beautiful Uchiura scenery, maybe we'll get an answer.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: What?! Come on! Please tell me, Nozomi!
